pages.text: Being exposed to the $(OS) causes irreversible effects, but, maybe you can turn them into benefits. To do this, you must Transcend.

pages.title: Level of Exposure
pages.text: On the lower right corner of your screen, you'll see a percentage, that show your level of exposure. When you defeat a paranormal creature or experience a paranormal activity, your exposure will increase, filling the bar beside the percentage, which when completed, will increase your level of exposure by 5%. When that occurs, you can transcend.
Used to transcend when you're ready. $(2br)You can find it in many haunted locations, or make it yourself with simple materials.

pages.title: Benefits
pages.text: With a transcendance altar, you can receive the benefits of increasing your exposure. Those benefits can come in the form of paranormal powers, increase in attributes or rituals.

pages.title: Attributes
pages.text: The $(OS) strengthens you in three ways, represented by three attributes. $(br)$(l)Strength/$ increases the speed you mine blocks and your damage.$(br)$(l)Vigor/$ increases your maximum health and how much food satisfies you. $(br)$(l)Presence/$ increases your maximum effort and allows you to learn more powerful rituals.

pages.title: Rituals and Powers
pages.text: The $(OS) also allows you to manifest entities for your own favor. $(l)Rituals/$ allows you to summon entities to do your bidding, while $(l)Paranormal Powers/$ modify your own being on it's entity's own vision.$(br)Read the categories "Rituals" and "Paranormal Powers".
